2109 the us of quadrat residu research a quadrat residu search method ha previous been suggest to avoid the cluster usual encount when hash address collis occur and linear search method ar us the search size becaus of the properti of quadrat residu is limit to on half of the storag tabl it is shown that for some class of prime number the complement of the set of quadrat residu can easili be determin and henc the entir tabl of size p where p is that prime number can be search cacm februari 1970 radk c e quadrat residu search method hash address address cluster scatter storag file search file address hash code quadrat search random search storag layout search 3 7 3 73 3 74 ca700206 jb februari 14 1978 10 30 am 1676 4 2109 1682 4 2109 1728 4 2109 1860 4 2109 1860 4 2109 1973 4 2109 1973 4 2109 1992 4 2109 2018 4 2109 2018 4 2109 2032 4 2109 2033 4 2109 2033 4 2109 2107 4 2109 2107 4 2109 2109 4 2109 2109 4 2109 2203 4 2109 2203 4 2109 2251 4 2109 2251 4 2109 2359 4 2109 2524 4 2109 2543 4 2109 2543 4 2109 2552 4 2109 2559 4 2109 2573 4 2109 2770 4 2109 2991 4 2109 3053 4 2109 1785 5 2109 1786 5 2109 1973 5 2109 2018 5 2109 2109 5 2109 2109 5 2109 2109 5 2109 2203 5 2109 2251 5 2109 2543 5 2109 2770 5 2109 2974 5 2109 3053 5 2109 911 6 2109 1329 6 2109 1785 6 2109 1785 6 2109 1785 6 2109 1785 6 2109 1785 6 2109 1785 6 2109 1786 6 2109 1786 6 2109 1786 6 2109 1786 6 2109 1786 6 2109 1786 6 2109 1869 6 2109 1973 6 2109 1973 6 2109 1973 6 2109 1973 6 2109 1992 6 2109 1992 6 2109 332 6 2109 2018 6 2109 2018 6 2109 2107 6 2109 2107 6 2109 2107 6 2109 2107 6 2109 2107 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2109 6 2109 2251 6 2109 2412 6 2109 2543 6 2109 2673 6 2109 2673 6 2109 2707 6 2109 2770 6 2109 492 6 2109
